title: What is the crystal field stabilization energy [CoCl4] 2-]? - Quora

response.answer_text: High spin Tetrahedral complex. d7 configuration. Also splitting energy for tetrahedral is 4/9 of that of octahedral. So the value comes out to be = -1.2 *4/9* octahedral splitting. I dont have the symbol here. But it is Delta(octahedral).
